name: Cox’s Bazar
description: Experience the beauty of the world’s longest natural sandy sea beach in Chittagong Division, Bangladesh, with breathtaking views of the Bay of Bengal.

name: Sundarbans
description: Explore the largest mangrove forest in the world, home to the Bengal tiger, in Khulna Division, Bangladesh, and witness its unique biodiversity and stunning natural beauty.

name: Srimangal
description: Immerse yourself in the scenic beauty of Srimangal in Sylhet Division, Bangladesh, known for its lush tea gardens and rich local culture, and enjoy a cup of delicious tea.

name: Rangamati
description: Discover the beauty of Rangamati in Chittagong Hill Tracts, Bangladesh, with its breathtaking hills, lakes, and waterfalls, and experience the unique culture of the indigenous communities.

name: Paharpur
description: Step back in time and explore the ancient ruins of Paharpur, a UNESCO World Heritage Site in Rajshahi Division, Bangladesh, and discover the history and culture of the region.

name: Sajek Valley
description: Escape to the serene and picturesque Sajek Valley in Rangamati District, Bangladesh, and enjoy the panoramic views of the mountains, clouds, and forests, and experience the local way of life.

name: Lalbagh Fort
description: Marvel at the magnificent Lalbagh Fort in Dhaka, Bangladesh, built in the 17th century by the Mughal Empire, and explore its beautiful gardens, tombs, and mosque.

name: Kuakata
description: Experience the beauty of Kuakata, a seaside town in Patuakhali District, Bangladesh, with its stunning panoramic views of the Bay of Bengal and its unique Buddhist and Hindu temples.
